BodyName: Committee on Fire and Emergency Management

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring provision of body armor to fire department employees within the bureau of emergency medical services providing emergency medical services
Items.MatterName: Requiring provision of body armor to fire department employees within the bureau of emergency medical services providing emergency medical services.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing de-escalation and self-defense training to fire department employees within the bureau of emergency medical services providing emergency medical services
Items.MatterName: Providing de-escalation and self-defense training to fire department employees within the bureau of emergency medical services providing emergency medical services.
